title: Digital Brokerage Apps Should Think Like Social Media Networks

title: "Price Fixing Is Not Profit Enhancing" Says Judge And Fines Garuda $13 Million
text: Airline Garuda Indonesia (IDX: GIAA) has been ordered by the Federal Court of Australia to pay A$19 million (US$13.14 million) in penalties for air cargo price fixing as part of a massive international cartel.

title: Wilson Logistics Acquires Market Transport
text: Wilson Logistics announced it has acquired the shares of Market Transport, a logistics company that serves the truckload market, primarily in the Pacific Northwest and the western United States, from Market Industries, a subsidiary of DSV A/S.

title: Korean Air CEO says ownership discussions are ongoing after patriarch's death

title: Trade tensions have hit cargo demand in Asia, but there's a silver lining for regional airlines

title: Factory activity shrinks across Asia, global recession fears mount
text: Factory activity contracted in most Asian countries last month as an escalating trade war between Washington and Beijing raised fears of a global economic downturn and heaped pressure on policymakers in the region and beyond to roll out more stimulus.
